{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Fullstack Web Developer",
  "description": "Quantum Side Technologies Limited specializes in building visually stunning, user-friendly web and mobile applications. The company offers services in web and mobile app development, AI and payment solutions, as well as financial and business platforms. We turn bold ideas into reality, aiming to build the future together with our clients.&nbsp;

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Fullstack Web Developer

Job Location: Lagos (Remote)
Job type: Full-time

Role Description


	This is a full-time remote role for a Fullstack Web Developer. The Fullstack Web Developer will be responsible for developing and maintaining both front-end and back-end components of web applications.
	Daily tasks include programming, web design, and ensuring seamless user experiences.
	The developer will also collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality software solutions.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field with&nbsp;2+ years of work experience with React.js
	Strong skills in Back-End Web Development (Laravel framework) or Node Js (Nest Js framework) and Front-End Development (React js)
	Proficiency in Web Development and Programming
	Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
	Strong communication and teamwork abilities
	Experience with AI and payment solutions is a plus
	Ability to work independently and remotely

Fullstack Web Developer Job at Quantum Side Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Quantum Side Technologies Limited specializes in building visually stunning, user-friendly web and mobile applications. The company offers services in web and mobile app development, AI and payment solutions, as well as financial and business platforms. We turn bold ideas into reality, aiming to build the future together with our clients. 

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Fullstack Web Developer

Job Location: Lagos (Remote)
Job type: Full-time

Role Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	This is a full-time remote role for a Fullstack Web Developer. The Fullstack Web Developer will be responsible for developing and maintaining both front-end and back-end components of web applications.
	Daily tasks include programming, web design, and ensuring seamless user experiences.
	The developer will also collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet project deadlines and deliver high-quality software solutions.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field with 2+ years of work experience with React.js
	Strong skills in Back-End Web Development (Laravel framework) or Node Js (Nest Js framework) and Front-End Development (React js)
	Proficiency in Web Development and Programming
	Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
	Strong communication and teamwork abilities
	Experience with AI and payment solutions is a plus
	Ability to work independently and remotely
    

    

        Click here to Apply
